pp-value-7.value: Our productsH+H is a provider of building materials. Our core activities are the production and sale of autoclaved aerated concrete ("AAC" or "aircrete") and calciumsilicate ("CSU" or "sand lime bricks"). The productsare building blocks used for wall building and pre-cast wall-panel solutions, primarily in the residential new-building segment.The product range also includes more advanced products, such as high-insulating blocks, larger elements and a range of traded goods used for wall-building.
